elements.name: panel1
elements.title: What obligations has the learner or the training company violated in the following cases?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Luisa doesn't go to work on Wednesday afternoons, but takes a day off.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Luisa skips vocational school.
elements.correctAnswer: Obligation to attend vocational school/obligation to do everything possible to achieve the apprenticeship objective

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Ilian has not yet received his September salary on October 15.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Alena is being bullied by her work colleagues. Her vocational trainer doesn't want to do anything about it, even though Alena has asked her to.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: What obligations has the learner or the training company violated in the following cases?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Cédric refuses to continue working for half an hour longer, even though his vocational trainer asks him to complete an urgent assignment today.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Cédric's vocational trainer demands that he skip vocational school to complete an urgent customer order.
elements.correctAnswer: Obligation of the training company to release time for vocational school

elements.name: question7
elements.title: The vocational trainer tells 18-year-old Luis that all employees in his company have four weeks' vacation.
elements.correctAnswer: Obligation to grant employees up to the age of 20 five weeks' vacation

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Loris was out so late at the weekend that he can't concentrate on Monday and makes a mistake that costs his training company dearly.
